Text:
If you're wondering which format to use, the original is the .mobi, and it looks the best.

I personally use http://www.fbreader.org/ to read .mobi files, and other formats.
Thank you for the upload. And many grats for not putting up only .pdf (Calibre always f's them up) Any way you have the new novel "Wolfheart" by Richard Knaak?
